name: BTL-A4 Y-wing Starfighter/Bomber
description: The Koensayr BTL-A4 Y-wing is a rugged attack starfighter widely used by the Rebel Alliance as a bomber and assault craft. Much of its armor plating is often stripped away for ease of maintenance, exposing its framework and conduits and giving it a distinctive skeletal profile. Slow but tough, Y-wings carry heavy ordnance loads—ion cannons, proton bombs, and torpedoes—making them ideal for anti-capital ship strikes and trench runs. Veteran pilots respect the Y-wing’s ability to limp home on systems that would have killed other starfighters outright.
